stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements best describes how the moths adapted to the new environment over time?

features.html: In England approximately 250 years ago, the peppered moth had light-colored wing patterns that camouflaged them against the light-colored trees. Over time in urban areas, the number of peppered moths with dark-colored wings increased as pollution from the Industrial Revolution darkened the trees the moths rested on.

choicesHtml: The moths adapted to the new environment through isolation.
The moths adapted to the new environment through primary succession.
The moths adapted to the new environment by changes in the genetics of the population.
The moths adapted to the new environment by becoming a generalist species.
